title: 457: CHATTY BROS: BIP Breakdown & Grayston's Surprise Trip
itunes:title: 457: CHATTY BROS: BIP Breakdown & Grayston's Surprise Trip
description:
The Bros chat about Grayston's surprise birthday trip, bears, SNL, and all their thoughts on epsiodes 2 and 3 of Bachelor in Paradise season 8!
